About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I'm a student at the University of Gloucestershire, completing a Bachelors degree in Cyber and Computer Security (hons). I have a passion for Cyber Security but my interests extend to automation and scripting, web development, Electrical Engineering, Internet of things, and a variety of other subjects. Alongside my studies, I enjoy teaching myself electronics and creating hardware and software projects, as well as taking on code projects to constantly push myself.

Web Development

Designing, Building, Maintaining, Hosting...

I have been asked to design and build multiple bespoke websites. As part of this service, I have set up and configured remote hosting myself. I have also installed and configured the wordpress CMS and taught my clients how to use it to continually update their site once I have finished it.

University

I'm studying Cyber and Computer Security...

Since september of 2018 I have been studying towards a bachelors degree in Cyber and computer Security. I am about to begin my second year and I will be studying modules on Data Analytics, Managing the security of information, Operating Systems, Cryptography and Security, Network Design and Configuration, Ethical Hacking and Security, and Cyber Human Factors.

Electrical Engineering

IoT, Electronic Security Systems, Solar...

Since taking an A-Level in the subject, I have had a keen interest in Electronics. I am particularly interested in IoT devices and Electronic Secrity Systems. Recently, I have become particularly interested in Renewable Energy systems such as Solar power generators and off-grid systems, which I hope to soon create a miniature version of as a project.
